definitions.definition: An extremely cruel act; a horrid act of injustice.
examples: to carry out / commit / perpetrate an atrocity
The regime is guilty of mass atrocities including forced displacement and the use of chemical weapons.

definitions.definition: The quality or state of being atrocious ; enormous wickedness; extreme criminality or cruelty .
An object considered to be extremely unattractive or undesirable .

main_definition: ( countable ) An extremely cruel act; a horrid act of injustice.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The quality or state of being atrocious ; enormous wickedness; extreme criminality or cruelty .
( countable ) An object considered to be extremely unattractive or undesirable .
